verbose_text: DNA oxidation by ROS is non random, and may precede mutations at the same sites.20 Fenton 's reagent induced base pair changes at mutation hot spot p53 codons 248, 249, 250 in human fibroblasts investigated by restriction fragment length polymorphism / polymerase chain reaction (RFLP / PCR).5 The DNA sequence containing mutated sites was amplified by PCR.
evidence: induced base pair changes at mutation hot spot p53
